name: Terminal Hacker
description:
Welcome to Terminal Hacker, the game where you can become the worlds best hacker. You are tasked with Cracking as many terminal passwords as you can, from doxing to to DDoSing, you can use whatever method you see fit. See how you stack up against your fellow hackers on the leaderboards.

  • 4 Different difficulties
  • 3 Different riveting gamemodes
  • Leaderboards to see how you rank against other hackers
